text: In geometry, a polyhedron is a three-dimensional shape with flat polygonal faces, straight edges and sharp corners or vertices
Creates an Archimedean, Catalan or Miscellaneous solid.
Great for building up fractals or complex iterative geometries, quick instancing onto points, or dunking in your tea.

summary: In geometry, a polyhedron is a three-dimensional shape with flat polygonal faces, straight edges and sharp corners or vertices
